The app is made giving considerations to all the problems that can arise. But some of them are out of the scope of the app and may still arise 
 1) File Not Found : Check whether the folder Attendance exists in the file manager and in it the file Attendance.csv file exists 
 2) Generic Faliure: Check whether you have enought account balance to sending the messages 
 3) No records found: Check whether there is data in the Attendace.csv file for sending messages 
 Other than that if any error occurs please check if the file is in the correct format and your mobile is properly sending messages 
 Please swipe right to return to main menu
